title: Expanding Multimodal Learning Spaces in E-Learning Through Polytopic Learning Design

context.prior_knowledge: Comprehension of core concepts and intermediate-level application skills
context.additional_context: Implementation of a polytopic learning environment that expands learning experiences by integrating physical and virtual spaces

learning_goals: Learners can analyze social issues from multiple perspectives through collaborative projects utilizing physical/virtual spaces.
Learners can plan learning activities without time/space constraints using digital devices and online platforms.
Learners can document reflective reports on interaction experiences across multiple learning spaces through project deliverables.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
